title: No Teemoing Shop?
body: Hello, I'm wondering why my teemoing shop is empty. I own all available skins in the game except for the three just released. It seems pretty unfair that I don't get special promos for these new skins just because I have so many skins. Please help.

replies.body:
Wow, you certainly have purchased *a ton* of content! Unfortunately, in your rare circumstance, the personal shop isn't much of a value. As with our previous personal shops, the [Teemoing 2016 Shop](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) doesn't include any content released within the last 3 months or any Legendary, Ultimate, and Limited skins.

Let me know if you have any other questions about this.

What did it show up for you as :o
Did you just not get anything
